contract_name.description: The name of the document, e.g., 'Mutual Non-Disclosure Agreement'.

effective_date.description: The date the agreement was signed or became effective.

nda_type.description: Specifies whether the NDA is mutual or one-way.

purpose_of_disclosure.description: A summary of the reason for sharing confidential information.

term_of_confidentiality.description: The duration the receiving party must keep the information confidential (e.g., '5 years', 'Perpetual').

definition_of_confidential_info.description: A brief summary of what constitutes confidential information under the agreement.
